016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi;
017
018import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
019import java.lang.reflect.Type;
020
021public class MessageWorkers {
022
023    private final Iterable<MessageWriter.Factory> writers;
024    private final Iterable<MessageReader.Factory> readers;
025
026    public MessageWorkers(Iterable<MessageWriter.Factory> writers, Iterable<MessageReader.Factory> readers) {
027        this.writers = writers;
028        this.readers = readers;
029    }
030
031    public <T> MessageWriter<T> newWriter(Class<?> type, Type genericType, String mediaType) {
032        MessageWriter<T> candidate = null;
033        for (MessageWriter.Factory factory : writers) {
034            MessageWriter<T> writer = factory.newWriter(type, genericType, mediaType);
035            if (writer != null) {
036                if (candidate == null) {
037                    candidate = writer;
038                } else {
039                    Class<?> candidateMessageType = getRootType(((ParameterizedType) candidate.getClass().getGenericInterfaces()[0]).getActualTypeArguments()[0]);
040                    Class<?> writerMessageType = getRootType(((ParameterizedType) writer.getClass().getGenericInterfaces()[0]).getActualTypeArguments()[0]);
041                    if (candidateMessageType.isAssignableFrom(writerMessageType))
042                        candidate = writer;
043                }
044            }
045        }
046
047        if (candidate != null)
048            return candidate;
049        else
050            throw new IllegalArgumentException("No MessageWriter found for type:" + type + ", mediatype:" + mediaType);
051    }
052
053    public <T> MessageReader<T> newReader(Class<?> type, Type genericType, String mediaType) {
054        MessageReader<T> candidate = null;
055        for (MessageReader.Factory factory : readers) {
056            MessageReader<T> reader = factory.newReader(type, genericType, mediaType);
057            if (reader != null) {
058                if (candidate == null) {
059                    candidate = reader;
060                } else {
061                    Class<?> candidateMessageType = getRootType(((ParameterizedType) candidate.getClass().getGenericInterfaces()[0]).getActualTypeArguments()[0]);
062                    Class<?> writerMessageType = getRootType(((ParameterizedType) reader.getClass().getGenericInterfaces()[0]).getActualTypeArguments()[0]);
063                    if (candidateMessageType.isAssignableFrom(writerMessageType))
064                        candidate = reader;
065                }
066            }
067        }
068
069        if (candidate != null)
070            return candidate;
071        else
072            throw new IllegalArgumentException("No MessageReader found for type:" + type + ", mediatype:" + mediaType);
073    }
074
075    private Class<?> getRootType(Type type) {
076        if (type instanceof ParameterizedType)
077            return (Class<?>) ((ParameterizedType) type).getOwnerType();
078        else
079            return (Class<?>) type;
080    }
081}
